Title: Authorizes one percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for sports programs for underserved youths
Summary: Authorizes one percent of mobile sports tax revenue, but not less than five million dollars, to be used for sports programs for underserved youths.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to authorizing one percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for sports programs for underserved youths
